entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
